memberdef.argsstring: (InterfaceType type, const std::string &interfacename, std::istream &sinput, EnvironmentBasePtr penv)
memberdef.name: CreateInterfaceValidated

inbodydescription.para: as long as this pointer is valid, the reader will remain registered

briefdescription.para: [helper] Validated function callback for returning a plugin's information. No checks need to be made on the parmaeters.

detaileddescription.para:
This function is called only once initially to determine what the plugin offers. It should be the safest funcdtion and should not create any static resources for the plugin. Only use when rave/plugin.h is included.
info
Holds information on what services this plugin provides.

briefdescription.para: [export] Stub function to be defined by plugin that includes rave/plugin.h.

ref.tooltip: [interface] Abstract base class to encapsulate a local controller. If not specified...
